351,100|339,102|322,115|264,115|206,125|148,127|72,132|62,196|121,200|182,200|202,201|322,201|342,202|442,202|462,203|582,203|602,204|722,204|742,205|842,205|862,206|982,206|1002,207|1082,207|1102,227|1122,207|1142,208|1242,208|1262,209|1382,209|1402,210|1502,210|1522,211|1582,211|1602,231|1642,231|1662,232|1682,232|1702,212|1782,212|1802,213|1902,213|1922,214|1942,214|1953,198|1958,156|1803,128|1759,126|1662,126|1642,125|1522,125|1502,124|1455,124|1391,125|1353,123|1322,123|1320,121|1286,119|1282,123|1262,123|1242,122|1142,122|1132,111|1108,110|1092,111|1082,121|1002,121|982,120|862,120|855,120|714,125|509,144|408,116|382,116|368,105|351,100 306-01|306.|Letters|Orders|and|Instructions.|Decem.|1755.
342,284|322,288|302,298|282,298|267,301|230,354|244,387|282,387|302,388|402,388|422,389|502,389|522,390|622,390|642,391|662,371|682,391|742,391|762,398|782,382|802,378|822,398|842,392|862,393|962,393|982,394|1082,394|1102,395|1122,395|1142,375|1162,375|1182,395|1202,376|1222,396|1242,396|1262,416|1282,416|1302,396|1322,397|1422,397|1442,398|1502,398|1522,378|1542,378|1562,419|1582,419|1602,399|1642,399|1662,400|1762,400|1776,401|1774,392|1884,366|1865,328|1802,328|1782,326|1602,326|1582,334|1562,328|1542,322|1522,320|1322,320|1302,318|1282,318|1262,312|1242,298|1222,296|1202,294|1182,292|1082,292|1062,296|1042,296|1022,300|862,300|842,298|722,298|702,296|682,296|662,292|522,292|502,290|482,288|462,286|382,286|362,284 306-02|has|been|at|2|/.|per|bushel.|You|may|procure

222,1479|217,1522|207,1546|220,1551|219,1561|222,1561|242,1562|302,1562|322,1563|382,1563|402,1564|462,1564|482,1565|542,1565|562,1566|602,1566|622,1586|642,1587|662,1567|702,1567|722,1568|782,1568|802,1569|862,1569|882,1570|942,1570|962,1571|1022,1571|1042,1572|1102,1572|1122,1573|1182,1573|1202,1574|1262,1574|1282,1575|1342,1575|1362,1576|1422,1576|1442,1577|1522,1577|1542,1578|1602,1578|1622,1579|1643,1579|1625,1574|1311,1571|1322,1496|1302,1495|1262,1495|1242,1494|1202,1494|1182,1493|1142,1493|1122,1492|1062,1492|1042,1491|1002,1491|982,1490|942,1490|922,1489|862,1489|842,1488|802,1488|782,1487|762,1507|742,1507|722,1486|662,1486|642,1485|602,1485|582,1484|542,1484|522,1483|462,1483|442,1482|402,1482|382,1481|342,1481|322,1480|262,1480|242,1479 306-16|to|the|Rendezvous|at|Winchester.
219,1561|217,1610|216,1652|222,1652|242,1653|302,1653|322,1654|382,1654|402,1655|462,1655|482,1656|542,1656|562,1657|622,1657|642,1658|702,1658|722,1659|782,1659|802,1660|862,1660|882,1661|962,1661|982,1662|1042,1662|1062,1663|1122,1663|1142,1664|1202,1664|1222,1665|1282,1665|1302,1666|1362,1666|1382,1667|1442,1667|1462,1668|1522,1668|1542,1669|1602,1669|1622,1650|1642,1670|1682,1670|1702,1671|1762,1671|1782,1672|1784,1672|1753,1609|1643,1579|1622,1579|1602,1578|1542,1578|1522,1577|1442,1577|1422,1576|1362,1576|1342,1575|1282,1575|1262,1574|1202,1574|1182,1573|1122,1573|1102,1572|1042,1572|1022,1571|962,1571|942,1570|882,1570|862,1569|802,1569|782,1568|722,1568|702,1567|662,1567|642,1587|622,1586|602,1566|562,1566|542,1565|482,1565|462,1564|402,1564|382,1563|322,1563|302,1562|242,1562|222,1561 306-17|N:|B.|Enquire|of|Mr.|Dick|and|other|Mer-
